What we are doing

We are building a complex of modern villas near Berawa Beach, one of the most popular beaches in Bali.
Thе location provides more than 15 objects to ensure comfortable living: cafes, sport and beach clubs, spa complexes, shops, and playgrounds.

Why is Bali island a good option for investment?

Bali is a popular destination for tourists all over the world. The tourist traffic had growing annually before the pandemic, reaching 6.3mln in 2019
  • Good investment climate

    Indonesia is in second place in 2021 among countries to invest in, according to U.S News.

  • Tourists’ choice

    Bali is #1 TripAdvisor Travelers' Choice Award in 2017 and 2021 rankings.

  • Fully yours

    Bali real estate does not need to be declared in your home country, so you save on taxes.

Our process:

1
Initiation
2
Construction
3
Acceptance
You sign an investment contract with Sunny Development Group and make a downpayment of 25%. The construction process starts within 10 days.
You pay in stages for ten months (5% monthly). During this period, you regularly get a summary of the progress made in each key area of the project (with photos).
The property is built, you are able to verify all the details and make the final payment of 25%. You get the documents and keys.

FAQ
  • If the situation with the pandemic goes on for years, will I incur losses?

    As we said earlier, domestic tourism allows keeping a level of villas occupancy high. The number of Indonesians coming to Bali had increased several times over. According to Indonesia's Tourism and Creative Economy Minister Sandiaga Uno, the influx of domestic tourists in Bali doubled in April.

    (https://www.indo-ned.com/news/bali-domestic-tourism-increases-to-4500-visitors-every-day-in-april)

    By the way, despite the current travel restrictions, visitors with business visas (and some other types) can enter the country. Moreover, Sandiago Uno says digital nomads will be granted 5-year visas with no taxes on foreign-sourced income. That will provide a new flow of remote workers to Bali. According to Gartner research, the number of remote employees will come to 51% by the end of 2021. In the near future, Bali can become the next Digital Technology Hub.

  • Do you provide a guarantee?

    Yes, we provide a 10-year warranty on the property we built. It splits into two periods. We fix every issue with fixtures and fittings that arise during the operation for three years (except for problems caused by the client). A 10-years warranty covers each defect of load-bearing elements (foundations, stairs, ceilings, walls, and roofs), waterproofing, plumbing, and electricals getting damaged. You can find complete information about all that in the documents.

  • I can buy land and build a villa without any help. That would be cheaper?

    First, foreigners cannot buy land in Bali. It is possible to get a land lease for 25 years. The area should not be agricultural or “green”. Second, you need to get initial permissions and a license for building a villa. Third, this process requires a detailed plan and a large group of professionals. It is necessary to take into account many technical moments regarding the legal and building aspects. There is a strong chance you’ll be wasting your money and time if you have no experience in this area. We are familiar with many instances when people could not finish the building process due to issues that have to do with the processes we described.

  • What if I decide to manage the villa without your help? Can I live in the villa?

    Yes, after the construction you will have the villa at your disposal.
